title: A Camellia Romance
overview: Through a strange combination of circumstances, Xu Chun Chun catches the eye of the Zhou family which has a reputation for being the world's number one tea merchant. They intend to have her marry their precious son Zhou Jun Jue who is the legitimate heir of the family. Xu Chun Chun may be the only daughter in their silk manor but she is continually oppressed by her stepmother. As a way out of her situation, Xu Chun Chun grits her teeth and accepts the wedding proposal. She wants nothing more than to be divorced but finds herself in a bind because Zhou Jun Jue has fallen in love with her.
